title: Denial of Justice - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/2/20
itunes:title: Denial of Justice - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/2/20
description:
George Noory and author Mark Shaw explore his research into the death of famous TV reporter Dorothy Kilgallen, who was working to connect the suspicious death of actress Marilyn Monroe to the conspiracy to assassinate President John F. Kennedy when Kilgallen herself died under peculiar circumstances.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A look at the death of a reporter linking the death of Marilyn Monroe to the JFK assassination.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
